subject: Re: [junit] Re: Junit support for non-standard distributed applications
msgSnippet: ... In this case, if you re attempting to test network problems, then I agree mock objects won t get you there. Mike -- Mike Clark Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
messageBody:
guillaume_berche wrote:

>
> More precisely, I need to exercise the network problems that can
> occur (which happen to behave differently based on which operating
> system the component is running on, albeit the program is written in
> Java), the potential threading problems (such as contention,
> deadlocks and other safety problems).
>

In this case, if you're attempting to test network problems, then I agree
mock objects won't get you there.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
http://www.clarkware.com
720.851.2014
